mapper.sql: SELECT COMP.COMP_SEQ AS compSeq , COMP.COMP_NM AS compNm , COMP.COMP_GB_CD AS compGbCd , COMP.COMP_TEL AS compTel , COMP.USE_YN AS useYn , DATE_FORMAT(COMP.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , REG_USER.USER_NM AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(COMP.UPDT_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS updtDt , UPDT_USER.USER_NM AS updtNm FROM TB_COMPANY COMP LEFT JOIN TB_USER REG_USER ON COMP.REG_SEQ = REG_USER.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER UPDT_USER ON COMP.UPDT_SEQ = UPDT_USER.USER_SEQ WHERE COMP.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(COMP_SEQ) FROM TB_COMPANY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
